description: This file defines a React component for a note editing page, handling fetching, displaying, editing, saving, starring, and deleting notes. It uses hooks for state and effects, and interacts with an API client.

methods.name: NoteRoute
methods.description: Main React component managing note viewing and editing.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Function to save the current draft as an updated note.

methods.name: toggleStar
methods.description: Function to toggle the starred status of the note.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Function to delete the current note after user confirmation.
